name: Uncle Goose Blocks
description:
When teaching your child how to read, write, sort, and just have fun, nothing beats simplicity. This set of 28 blocks is crafted from sustainable Michigan basswood, then embossed and printed with a colorful range of non-toxic inks. Each block tells a story, and since there are several sides to any story, you’ll find a variety of animals, numbers, math symbols, and four full alphabets.

28 1.75" cubes (44mm)

name: Wooden Beads
description:
Raw and natural wooden beads.
Pack of 10
6.5cm

name: Wooden Ring
description: 70mm natural wooden ring, untreated wood.

name: Rattle Insert
description:
25mm rattle insert, sealed and safe.

name: Christmas Stocking
description:
Made by Pashom Fair trade, this is a gorgeous red felt stocking.

name: The Little Christmas Tree
description:
The little Christmas tree hates its sharp needles, and longs to have soft leaves like all the other trees. But will it be happier when its wish is granted? Perhaps it's not so bad being a little Christmas tree after all...This is a charming story about learning that the grass is not always greener on the other side. The perfect picture book for a cold winter's evening around the fireside.

-Loek Koopmans

name: Little Fairy's Christmas
description: This is an enchanting tale of kindness, set at Christmas time.  As with all of Daniela Drescher's books, beautiful, delicate illustrations make this charming book one to treasure.

name: My First Day at School
description:
"We line up at the door with all the other families….I shake off Mum's hand and run inside to play."

by Meredith Costain and Michelle Mackintosh

name: The Sun Seed
description:
"Early one spring morning, a little seed woke up after her long winter sleep. She yawned and stretched. With a loud CRACK her hard brown jacket fell away. "Oh!" said the surprised seed. The earth above felt warm."
... this was just the beginning of big changes to come

…simply a beautiful book

name: Branch Blocks

name: Walk along Puppy

Age	12+ Months

Product size	L: 8.66, W: 3.62, H: 6.38 inch

name: Wooden Board Book

Sturdy wooden pages and simple pictures encourage babies to read along with you. (8 pages) Self Discovery: Enhance baby's perspective with visual, tactile, and auditory cues. Social Skills: The basics of communication, cooperation, and collaboration; encourages trust, friendship, and language development.
Age	10+ Months

Main Materials	Wood, Water based paint, String

name: Stormy Seas Game

Hey Ho, Sailors! The boat is ready to be loaded with cargo. Heads up - the loads and boxes must be balanced equally on the boat because the valuable cargo can go overboard if the seas become rough!
Stormy Seas is a balancing game for the whole family where a high degree of strategy is required. a game of balancing
Age	3+ Years

Package size	L 13, W 13, H 3.9inch
Main Materials	bamboo

description: Eight brightly coloured bars produce different sounds for your child to practice recognising musical notes, as well as hand-eye coordination to hit each bar in the right place.

They'll learn about consideration and care for others with traditional stories from the Bible. Includes large ark, Noah doll, his wife, ladder and eight pairs of lively animals, which fit into the ark. Ideal for improving shape recognition and learning about the animal kingdom.

L: 24.00cm W: 17.40cm H: 20.20cm

name: Toolbox
description: Your child learns through role-play, discovery and practicing what they’ve seen. Our wooden workbench includes bolts, hammers, wrench, saw, detachable parts and ruler to build dexterity and spatial awareness.

description:
Charming, detailed doll house inspires any child's creativity as they play-out the stories they imagine. Includes two wooden dolls, trees, welcome sign, table and chairs, sofa, fence and front opening facia with lift-off roof for easy access.

L: 45.50cm W: 29.00cm H: 51.00cm

name: Stitched Safari
description:
Stitched Safari: 18 Adorable Animals to Make with Felt by Tomomi Maeda

The definitive collection of felt creatures to create! You’ll find everything from pug dogs to flamingos to simple goats, cows and cats, all beautifully photographed and well explained. If you can do blanket stitch you can fill your own felt ark with these creations. A value packed book that every toy crafter should consider!

name: Steiner Inspired Alphabet Book
description: features 26 hand drawn, characterised illustrations of the letters of the alphabet. Each picture is the letter, and each letter is the picture — taking children on a journey of both heart and mind. Old Freedom Train includes poems, nursery rhymes and songs — adding to the joy and connection children will experience when travelling from 'Angel' to 'Zebra'.

name: Life on Earth
description:
Flora and fauna from around the world show the richness of Life on Earth. Twenty-four pairs of tiles include everything from iguanas to cardinals, oak leaves and acorns to underwater coral.

name: Geese Puzzle
description: These puzzles are made from natural birch wood and are beautifully hand-painted using eco-friendly non-toxic paints. Most of our puzzles depict scenes from European fairy tales and folk lore, and have been designed so they can be put together 'standing up' to create a 3-dimensional interactive scene from the story with separate characters for role play.

description: These puzzles are made from natural birch wood and are beautifully hand-painted using eco-friendly non-toxic paints. name: Anorak Magazine for Kids
description:
The Anorak Press is an independent kids publishing house established in 2006 by proud Mum Cathy Olmedillas, formerly of 90s lifestyle bibles The Face and Sleazenation. It publishes Anorak Magazine five times a year, which is sold all around the world.

Anorak Magazine, the ‘happy mag for kids’ is aimed at boys and girls aged between 6 and 12 years old. Please note that we welcome kids of any age to enjoy our magazine but to really fully enjoy it, they need to be proficient readers.

name: Amber Teething Necklace
description:
Amber Necklace 
by Glückskäfer

Product Description
Baltic amber has been used for centuries to alleviate pain and assist in promoting a peaceful state of mind. It is particularly popular in Europe where it is commonly used to relieve teething pain in infants.

Children's amber necklaces (36-38cm) have reportedly been beneficial for children experiencing "growing pains", headache or neckache. Amber has also been reported to be effective in the management of eczema.

Amber is not a stone - it is fossilised tree sap. Baltic amber contains succinic acid which is a natural analgesic. The lighter and cloudier amber contains the highest levels of succinic acid.

Every piece of amber jewellery is uniquely handcrafted in Lithuania. Every bead is individually knotted to ensure beads are not lost in the event of breakage. The screw clasp should secure the amber against the skin to achieve the best therapeutic benefit.

name: Education Towards Freedom
description:
Yhis book covers all aspects of Steiner-Waldorf education and divides it into pre-school years, the first eight years (starting about age 7), and the last four years (from 14 to 18). There are also sections on the rhythm of the day, specific subjects, the use of textbooks, and the school in the modern world
by Frans Carlgren

name: Little Ava Stories
description:
Three stories about Ava and Nana and their special time together. From feeding the chickens and walking in the rain to making a mountain of autumn leave to jump in to, these stories take the reader through the changing seasons.

These little stories celebrate the relationship between a grandparent and a child and also between a child and nature.

name: Puzzle Blocks
description: Beautiful hand crafted puzzle blocks made in Tasmania from the sweetest old books

name: Fruit Tree
description: Sweet wooden fruit trees complete with fruit!

name: Stockmar Crayons - Small Tin
description:
Small tins - 8 items
Stockmar wax crayons meet the highest artistic standards. Through the addition of pure beeswax as a binding agent, the light-resistant pigments display their purity and full brilliance.
Because they are mixed with wax, the colours are able to be used in a wide range of interesting colouring techniques - more than any other colouring material. The natural transparency of the wax and the lack of additives result in a high degree of opacity like that of watercolours.
Stockmar quality is controlled reliability

name: All the dear little animals
description:
'One summer's day we started a business called Funerals Ltd, to help all the poor dead animals in the world. Esther did the digging, i wrote the poems and Esther's little brother, Puttie, cried."

All the dear little animals is a thoroughly off beat, charming and whimsical story of three children responding to death.
Ulf Nilsson is a celebrated children's author in Sweden and a winner of the August and American Batchelder awards.

name: The Creative Family
description:
Between work and school, music lessons, and sports practice, there is less and less time to connect as a family. Those few moments together are often spent making meals, doing homework, or watching TV. In this inspiring book, Amanda Soule, a young mother of three, presents simple ways to use arts and crafts and other forms of creativity to deepen family connections. 
by Amanda Blake-Soule

name: Handmade Home
description:
amazing book written by Amanda Blake-Soule

Handmade Home: Simple Ways To Repurpose Old Materials Into New Family Treasures

Handmade Home offers simple sewing and craft projects for the home that reflect the needs, activities, and personalities of today

name: Storytelling with Children
description:
"Nancy Mellon believes any parent can, and should, become a confident, creative storyteller. A story told by you is a gift to your child; a wonderful act of sharing and communication which enriches family life"

by Nancy Mellon

name: Ready to Learn
description:
When are children ready for school? Many parents are concerned about 'hot housing' their children, about too much formal schooling too soon.
Ready to Learn will help you consider the transition from kindergarten to school.
by Martyn Rawson and Michael Rose

Includes pre-sewn body made from cotton interlock, triple stitched for strength and hand dyed for beauty, thread, string, inner head tubing, wool stuffing and yarn!

Comes complete with pre-sewn body from cotton broadcloth, clean and carded fleece for stuffing, tubon and string for making the head, embroidery thread for eyes and mouth, yarn for the hair and comprehensive intsructions!
A lovely gift to make for the special one in your life!
